body:
Hello, 1.9s first snapshot just came out, what's ur opinion about it?

Myself I think it's actually pretty cool, it will bring something very special to pot pvp ;)

If you don't know how to enable snapshots, this is how you do it:
Go to "Edit profile"
Press Enable experimental development versions
Go to "Use version" and pick snapshot 15w31a

I'd recommend you checking out the end.
body_tagged:
Hello, 1.9s first snapshot just came out, what's ur opinion about it?

Myself I think it's actually pretty cool, it will bring something very special to pot pvp ;)

If you don't know how to enable snapshots, this is how you do it:
Go to "Edit profile"
Press Enable experimental development versions
Go to "Use version" and pick snapshot 15w31a

I'd recommend you checking out the end.
title: 1.9 snapshots are out!

replies.body:
After playing with it for a bit, it's not that bad...The poison arrows look really cool and useful. I am excited to see what else they add. 

Also, the left hand thing is pretty cool, but putting blocks in there is kinda dumb because you can't really block spam with a sword or bow in your hand.
replies.body_tagged:
After playing with it for a bit, it's not that bad...The poison arrows look really cool and useful. I am excited to see what else they add. 

Also, the left hand thing is pretty cool, but putting blocks in there is kinda dumb because you can't really block spam with a sword or bow in your hand.

replies.body: It's pretty cool, the only thing that I'm not really a fan of is the default controls-
replies.body_tagged: It's pretty cool, the only thing that I'm not really a fan of is the default controls-

replies.body:
Button 1 = Left click

Button 2 = Right Click

Button 3 = Scroll Wheel

 not sure why they name them that, but yeah. Plus, that's always been the default I believe

replies.body: I tried it and I found it weird. I am a little disappointed with some arrows that were put in the game but it will be interesting with how they can be implanted to the game. Pvp feels much smoother which I love and after seeing it a bit I actually hope block hitting gets removed. It would make much more sense  with the shields which will be way less ping based for players

replies.body:
In a future snapshot, I'd like to see a way to use the item in your off-hand instead of the item in your main hand. 
Shifting would allow you to place a block that's in your off-hand, while a sword is still in your main hand.
replies.body_tagged:
In a future snapshot, I'd like to see a way to use the item in your off-hand instead of the item in your main hand. 
Shifting would allow you to place a block that's in your off-hand, while a sword is still in your main hand.

replies.body: That's a good idea, but I feel it would have to be where you press a different key instead of shift because that would get annoying.
replies.body_tagged: That's a good idea, but I feel it would have to be where you press a different key instead of shift because that would get annoying.
